attributes.action: I mr. John Taylor, am calling for the removal of Jeremy Corbyn as Labour leader.
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Britain have considered that Jeremy Corbyn does not and has not taken the people of this country or its associates to this country's interests at the heart of his labour leadership, in the interests of this country we need a labour leader who puts this country and its people, its security, its wellbeing first before himself, it is therefore that I call for the removal of Jeremy Corbyn.
Thank you.
attributes.background: I Mr. John Taylor Esq, Subject of the Crown of England hereby place before parliament a full petition to remove Jeremy Corbyn from remaining as Labour leader and formally ask the Parliament of England to remove his member of Parliament status, that we consider that he is a liability to this country.

rejection.details: The leader of the Labour party is chosen by the party itself, not by the UK Government or Parliament.
